com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium

Class MultiBrowserRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.Runner
      • org.junit.runners.ParentRunner<org.junit.runner.Runner>
        • org.junit.runners.Suite
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.MultiBrowserRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.runner.Describable, org.junit.runner.manipulation.Filterable, org.junit.runner.manipulation.Sortable

    public class MultiBrowserRunner
extends org.junit.runners.Suite
    MultiBrowserRunner is a jUnit Suite which will run a single WComponentSeleniumTestCase using multiple browsers. It should only be used as follows: 
       @RunWith(MultiBrowserRunner.class)
   public class MySeleniumTest extends WComponentSeleniumTestCase
   {
      // your test code here
   }
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
